item.title: Halo Sniper :)
item.dc:creator: @hippie408 hippie408
item.description:
@hippie408 wrote:

Here’s a Halo Sniper

Pic:

Here is the download:

http://uppit.com/5TW0VD

Here is the int:

if(i == 7609){ // Item Id class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//Options class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5];//original model colour class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5];// changed model colour class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 923; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 920; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 920; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 923; class8.anInt174 = 9150;//Inv & ground class8.anInt181 = 2000;//zoom class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt165 = 9150;//male MODEL ID class8.anInt200 = 9150;//female MODEL ID class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Sniper Gun";//name of item class8.aByteArray178 = "Halo Ftw.".getBytes(); // examine }

There is no drop model, but when its dropped by a wall looks like its leaning on it like in Halo.

100% Creds to Dragmagic I guess…lol.
